arts.ttl: Real Madrid turn to Juventus star in search for Dani Carvajal successor
arts.sum: Real Madrid are reportedly very keen to sign a new right-back in 2025. Dani Carvajal’s season-ending knee injury has led to club bosses fast-tracking their plans to secure a successor, with backup Lucas Vazquez also out of contract at the end of the season. Trent Alexander-Arnold remains Real Madrid’s leading target, although they will likely […] The post Real Madrid turn to Juventus star in search for Dani Carvajal successor appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Lazio’s Romagnoli Suspended for One Match After Red Card Against Juventus
How Juventus' social media account wrongly announced the signing of Arda Guler
arts.sum: Juventus have admitted that their X social media account was hacked on Monday evening, after a post announced that they had signed Real Madrid starlet Arda Guler. Guler has been on the books at Real Madrid for just over one year, having joined during the 2023 summer transfer window for an initial €20m, but has struggled for game time at the Santiago Bernabeu.

arts.ttl: Touré delivers knockout blow as Stuttgart take out Juventus
arts.sum: With the help of Atalanta Bergamo El Bilal Touré, VfB Stuttgart have ensured that the scoreline matched their efforts at the Torino Allianz Arena on Tuesday evening. Sebastian Hoeneß' German Champions' League representatives took all three points against Italian giants Juventus FC via a throughly deserved win. The Germans shook off a controversially disallowed goal and a missed penalty to finally claim victory in second half injury time.
